title: name 3 champions you would delete from this game

replies.body:
None of 'em. Because I'm not a bitch.
http://img.cinemablend.com/cb/4/1/a/b/2/7/41ab275084ed00dc330f5208422555b63974780eeb2ffc0d57347ff20fae6df1.jpg

Agreed no champion is so badly esigned that it needs to be completely removed.

Some may need major changes but most only slight.

I don't think you understand what 3 means kid...

{{champion:84}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:39}}

{{champion:8}} Honorable mention because even Riot said they wished they never released him, but then when rework time came around and they hand the chance to cut off the tumor, instead they called it "unique" and made the rest of him better accomodated to the tumor.

{{champion:7}} I need to explain this?
{{champion:157}}  I play this guy. But fuck yasuo. At least he's free gold when i play morde. 
{{champion:74}} Can't gank him. Can't win lane vs him. Fuck heimer.


If more than 3:

{{champion:105}} Let's do all of us a favor, okay?
{{champion:266}} Complete shit. Kit is stupid, doesn't fit lore, is useless. 
{{champion:53}} Hook? No flash? No sorako? You're dead. 
{{champion:245}} Can't shut his ass down. 
{{champion:80}} Top lane nightmare. Pls. 
{{champion:64}} Has pretty much a bit of everything. His only downfall? Shitty late game really. And the lee sin player.  Not op but feels stupid as fuck to play against.
Those guys are fine. Annoying as fuck but not too OP.
Pretty much what i meant. Out of the 3 only yasuo is op in the toplane with freeloforce yasuo.

{{champion:53}} Too binary
{{champion:266}} Either broken or worthless
{{champion:157}}  Because that's the only way to fix his bug since Riot doesn't seem to give a shit.
{{champion:105}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:157}} dont really add anything to the game.

> [{quoted}](name=warpenguin555,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=irMe7HTf,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-09-03T23:55:03.622+0000)
>
> {{champion:105}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:157}} dont really add anything to the game.

{{champion:114}} is a great champion >_>

{{champion:238}} - I love playing this guy but the damage he does everytime is too much. 
{{champion:105}} - His damage is ridiculous, really fking ridiculous.
{{champion:202}} - Cool character but fk his range.
The most predictable thread I have ever seen.

{{champion:37}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:143}} Just so I can watch the world burn, especially half of this community having a huge bias on them kappa

Though on all seriousness: {{champion:60}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:7}} 
Either complete dead weight or super relevant then dead weight champs. All have a fairly toxic PLAYERbase (not mains, *players*), are either super OP or super useless when numbers aren't tuned correctly, and are very difficult to work with/against as backliners.

Ekko, Fizz, and Lee Sin can at least still do some contribution when they fall behind, Yasuo is actually fairly peel-able as long as you bait out his windwall, which CAN get tricky at times, Riven is VERY susceptible to CC especially silence, and Kalista you can make an actual effort to work WITH her and do something even when behind. Yes, all of them I mentioned are "overloaded" to some extent, but so are Nid and Elise.

I'm probably gonna get downvoted to hell for actually finding Fizz/Ekko/Yasuo acceptable, but I really should have listed mages instead. No, at least mages can still do a LOT when behind, unlike Nid, LB, and Elise, despite most of such mages being very difficult to peel from.

Lol at all the people saying 3 assassins. Have some imagination people. Pick champs that would really impact the game by being gone rather than an assassin that could simply be replaced by the next assassin in line. 

With that in mind: {{champion:98}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:80}}, and all for the same reasons. They have uninteractive laning phases, shut down aggression across the map with their global pressure, and are far too easy to execute mechanically for the impact they have on the game. What better champions to get rid off than ones who play other lanes rather than their own?
{{champion:67}} {{champion:114}}  beCAUSE CANCER TRUE DMG{{champion:67}} {{champion:114}}  beCAUSE CANCER TRUE DMG{{champion:67}} {{champion:114}}  beCAUSE CANCER TRUE DMG
Too many, 3 isn't enough; not to ban, not to delete

{{champion:16}} I dont care if she is strong or weak, it makes bot lane a snoozefest. I hate her so much, she is my goto ban. Exept if we really need a targeted ban. Like cait when we have a Vayne.
{{champion:105}} Slipeery fish need to go.
{{champion:67}} Dont want with me, dont want against me. Either will dominate so hard that there will be a movie called "50 shades of Vayne" or feed to the point she gets a Peace Nobel Prize for solving the world hunder problem. Nothing inbeween.


Honorable mentions. Ahri just to see people go mad their waifu is MIA. Shaco because the very good ones can be hella oppresive.

{{champion:105}} Stop building Triforce.
{{champion:245}} Why are you allowed to do well with Triforce.
{{champion:157}} No.

{{champion:157}} {{champion:245}} 
Skirmish play style is not health (in lol) and one of the worst decisions made by Riot as a concept

{{champion:157}}  {{champion:55}} {{champion:23}} 

Because resourceless (or without a meaningful resource) champs are cancer.

Honorable mention goes to {{champion:412}} cause his kit is too damn overloaded and synergizes together way too well.

Add any resourceless champ to the team though, {{champion:238}}, {{champion:92}}, {{champion:154}}. You name it, I hate it.
but zed uses "energy" that shit aint easy to recover kappa

{{champion:245}} : lol my kit is just so overloaded too bad Riot can't go back in time and split me into 3 champions

{{champion:157}} : lol have fun laning against me if you are a skillshot mage or ranged dash dash dash dash wind wall dash dash dash dash shield dash dash dash dash

{{champion:238}} : lol gl ganking me and denying me farm you have to build against me but I always build the same thing and then when I hit 6 I will kill you without any counterplay under your tower
